about_the_game:
Smokey the toad is not your average amphibian. With a propane-fueled weed burner in hand, he charges into battle against a relentless force of hostile frogs in a race war that threatens to tear his world apart. Get ready to take on the challenge of 30 heart-pumping levels across 5 intense environments. And with power-ups and secrets to discover, every level is full of surprises.

Encounter fast-paced action, eccentric characters, and intense boss battles that will keep you on the edge of your seat! But don't worry, Smokey has a few tricks up his sleeve. With special attacks like blasting forward as a ball of fire and zooming across the sky with his flamethrower-jetpack combo, nothing can stop this determined toad.

With thrilling gameplay, exciting battles, and an engaging story, Smokey's adventure is one you won't want to miss! Get ready to save the world and become a hero in this thrilling 2D shooter game.
